column5: Modern, upscale 2-bedrooms and 2-bathrooms fully equipped apartment is in the heart of downtown Dallas near restaurants, shopping, and many more attractions Dallas has to offer just outside the front door. You can certainly walk to almost everything. The apartment offers a fully equipped kitchen, stainless steel appliances, coffee maker with K-cups, in-home washer and dryer, fresh towels, bathroom essentials, beautiful rooftop pool, fitness center, and sleep up to 7 people.
